content:
Purpose of Breakout is

  • Look at the current space of application areas of messaging, presence, chat, simulation/graphics, integration and identify the past, present, and future killer apps.

  • Past: What is the first event-based killer app? Which applications should be revisited in the presence of ISEN?

  • Present: What are today's killer apps and who is building them?

  • Future: What applications do the new technologies enable?
